messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
I need a break. How far are we from Christmas Day?
Sure—what date and time should I use as “now”? Please let me know the current year, month, day (and if you like, hour, minute, second) so I can calculate how far away Christmas Day is.
I don't have that info right now.

To compute the exact interval until Christmas Day I need a reference “now” date. Could you let me know at least the current year, month, and day? (Hour/minute/second are optional if you want a more precise answer.)
I don't have that info at the moment. Can you figure it out with your tools?

I’m afraid I don’t have access to a “current date/time” API—my existing tools can only convert or compare timestamps you supply. Could you please tell me your current year, month, and day (hour/minute/second optional)? Once I have that “now” timestamp, I can compute how long until Christmas Day.
I really don't have the date and time info. Hope you can work it out on your side!

I’m sorry, but I don’t have an automated way to fetch “now.” To calculate how long until Christmas Day, I need at least your current date (year, month, day). Hour/minute/second are optional for extra precision. Could you please provide that?
